Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 DamenTemporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/17th
ShortDescription: Northbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Damen/17th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Ashland and Roosevelt: due to, street blockage near Damen/17th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
